sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [AircraftRegistrationId]
,[CarrierIndex]
,[FlightNumber]
,[FlightNumberSuffix]
,[OperationDay]
,convert(datetime,concat(substring(ScheduledTimeOfDeparture,1,2),'/',substring(ScheduledTimeOfDeparture,3,2),'/',SUBSTRING(ScheduledTimeOfDeparture,5,4),' ',ScheduledTimeOfDepartureTime),103) as [ScheduledTimeOfDeparture]
,[DepartureStation]
,[ScheduledTimeOfArrival]
,[ArrivalStation]
,null as FlightServiceType
,[DelayCodeIndex1]
,[DelayCodeIndex2]
,[DelayCodeIndex3]
,[DelayCodeIndex4]
,[DelayCodeIndex5]
,[DelayCodeIndex6]
,[DelayCodeIndex7]
,[DelayCodeIndex8]
,[DelayCodeIndex9]
,[DelayCodeIndex10]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime1]) as [DelayTime1]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime2]) as [DelayTime2]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime3]) as [DelayTime3]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime4]) as [DelayTime4]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime5]) as [DelayTime5]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime6]) as [DelayTime6]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime7]) as [DelayTime7]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime8]) as [DelayTime8]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime9]) as [DelayTime9]
,DATEDIFF(SECOND,0,[DelayTime10]) as [DelayTime10]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT1]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT2]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT3]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT4]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT5]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT6]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT7]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT8]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT9]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexMVT10]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE1]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE2]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE3]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE4]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE5]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE6]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE7]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE8]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE9]
,[DelayCodeIndexVOYAGE10]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE1]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE2]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE3]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE4]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE5]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE6]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE7]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE8]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE9]
,[DelayTimeVOYAGE10]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE1]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE2]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE3]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE4]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE5]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE6]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE7]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE8]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE9]
,[SubDelayCodeIndexVOYAGE10]
,[TCreatedId]
,[TLoadDate]
,[TFileName]
 FROM [BcAdfAims].[FlightDelays_Stage]
 where tfilename = '@{pipeline().parameters.FlightDelaysInputFileName}'

SELECT SUBSTRING(RawData,1,6) as CarrierIndex
,SUBSTRING(RawData,7,7) as FlightNumber
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,14,2)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,14,2) end as FlightLegCode
,SUBSTRING(RawData,16,4) as DepartureStation
,SUBSTRING(RawData,20,5) as ArrivalStation
,convert(date,SUBSTRING(RawData,25,11),103) as OperationDay
,SUBSTRING(RawData,36,7) as ScheduledTimeOfDeparture
,SUBSTRING(RawData,43,6) as ScheduledTimeOfArrival
,convert(date,SUBSTRING(RawData,49,10),103) as EstimatedDepartureDay
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,59,7)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,59,7) end as EstimatedTimeOfDeparture
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,66,7)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,66,7) end as EstimatedTimeOfArrival
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,73,7)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,73,7) end as ATDBlockOffTimeBasedOnSITAMVT
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,80,7)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,80,7) end as TakeOffTimeBasedOnSITAMVT
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,87,7)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,87,7) end as TouchDownTimeBasedOnSITAMVT
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,96,8)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,96,8) end as ATABlockOnTimeBasedOnSITAMVT
,SUBSTRING(RawData,102,7) as ExpectedPassengers
,SUBSTRING(RawData,109,7) as TotalFlightPassengers1
,SUBSTRING(RawData,116,7) as TotalFlightPassengers5
,SUBSTRING(RawData,123,5) as AircraftTypeIndex
,SUBSTRING(RawData,128,11) as AircraftRegistrationID
,SUBSTRING(RawData,139,7) as FlightServiceType
,SUBSTRING(RawData,146,5) as AircraftRouteNumber
,convert(date,SUBSTRING(RawData,151,15),103) as AircraftRouteStartingDate
,SUBSTRING(RawData,166,7) as FlightStatus
,convert(date,SUBSTRING(RawData,173,11),103) as OriginalDepartureDayOfRescheduledAC
,SUBSTRING(RawData,195,9) as OriginalDepartureSTDOfRescheduledAC
,SUBSTRING(RawData,204,7) as RescheduledACRegistration
,case when trim(SUBSTRING(RawData,211,7)) = '' then null else SUBSTRING(RawData,211,7) end as OriginalSTAOfRescheduledACleg
,[TCreatedId]
,[TLoadDate]
,[TFileName]
FROM [BcAdfAims].[FlightSchedule_MST_Stage]
 where tfilename = '@{pipeline().parameters.FlightSchedule_MSTInputFileName}'

SELECT 
SUBSTRING(RawData,50,6) as AircraftRegistrationId
,SUBSTRING(RawData,1,6) as CarrierID
,SUBSTRING(RawData,7,7) as FlightNumber
,convert(date,SUBSTRING(RawData,25,10),103) as OperationDay
,SUBSTRING(RawData,17,4) as DepartureStation
,SUBSTRING(RawData,21,4) as ArrivalStation
,SUBSTRING(RawData,62,7) as SlotTime
,[TCreatedId]
,[TLoadDate]
,[TFileName]
,null as FlightNumberSuffix
,convert(date,null,103) as ScheduledTimeOfDeparture
,null as ScheduledTimeOfDepartureField
,convert(date,null,103) as EstimatedTimeOfDeparture
,null as EstimatedTimeOfDepartureField
,null as SlotTimeField
FROM [BcAdfAims].[FlightSlot_Stage]
where tfilename = '@{pipeline().parameters.FlightSlotInputFileName}'
